An amazing sequel to the 2007 timeless classic. Portal 2 surprised me thanks to the way it handles physics and the clever jokes the characters have. The story feels really elaborate and the atmosphere is really better than the atmosphere that Portal had which felt more lonely.
best singleplayer game ive ever played
Great sequel to the first one, and a masterclass of improving mechanics and adding features.
One of the best games, unfortunately valve doesn't know what 3 means sed

[h1] A playable masterpiece. [/h1]
Great story with funny and logical jokes and influential lore information, interesting level design, advanced physics and even more good things.

Portal 2 will bring me memories for being the first Portal game I ever played and the third game that I legally bought in Steam.

Ciertamente uno de los mejores juegos para pasar el rato. Tiene una buena historia y los niveles son muy entretenidos, ademas de que no necesitas una pc muy buena para poderlo jugar bien.
Un buen detalle que tiene es que puedes jugar c√°maras creadas por otros jugadores, tambi√©n puedes crear tus propias c√°maras y jugar en ellas con m√°s personas.
This game can run ON ANY COMPUTER IN THE WORLD WITH AAA GRAPHICS Not only that but its the best puzzle game and the storyline is amazing!

This game is awesome! Also, if you accidentally press "R" while playing and a icon with a thumbs up and thumbs down appears, restart the game. Close it out and then re-enter the game. You can also unbind r in the settings.
